text:
q - whiplash (point target)
mana - 150
cd - 15
deal 90/180/270/360 damage in a line in the target direction that is 500 units long by 200 units wide. 
enemies caught at the very end get pulled 250 units towards you and are stunned for 1 second.

w - overflow (point target)
mana - 70/80/90/100
cd - 15/13/11/9
cast range - 600/700/800/900
drench foes in enchanted wine, applying a 7 second slow to enemies in a 300 unit area. 
it starts out at zero but escalates to 30/45/60/75% move slow and 60/90/120/150 attack slow by the end.
for each enemy hero affected, koh gains 75 attack speed.

e - chomp (unit target)
mana - 70
cd - 30/24/18/12
cast range - 300
damage a target unit for 2.5 times strength, leashing the target to you and preventing it from moving more than 300 units for 2.5 seconds.
if the target is killed, gain 4 strength until you are killed. strength bonus stacks up to 4/6/8/10 times.

r - absorption (no target)
mana - 200/225/250
cd - 90/80/70
aoe - 700/800/900
for 5 seconds, absorb all damage allied heroes take and drain health per second equal to 3/5/7% of missing hp from all enemy heroes.
cannot be cast if koh is at full hp.
aghanim's scepter makes absorption calculate damage by max hp and become pure/piercing.

talents
10 - +4 mana regen or overflow affects allies*
15 - +120 gpm or +12 all stats
20 - -20 absorption cooldown or +2/6 armor per creep/hero slowed by overflow
25 - +2 chomp strength mult / per kill or absorption grants magic immunity

*allies and self gain a speed boost that increases over time if hit by talent-boosted overflow. koh does not gain attack speed or armor from allies affected.
